welcome.subject: Welcome to {{.app}} App!
welcome.body:
Dear {{.username}},

We are thrilled to welcome you to the {{.app}} app! Thank you for choosing our platform to enhance your language learning journey.

{{.app}} is designed to provide you with an immersive and interactive experience in learning multiple languages. Here are a few tips to get you started:

1. Explore Language Packs: Dive into our wide range of language packs and choose the ones that interest you the most.
2. Daily Practice: Consistency is key. Make use of our daily practice feature to keep up with your learning goals.
3. Interactive Exercises: Engage with interactive exercises to reinforce your learning and improve your fluency.
4. Community Support: Join our community forums to connect with fellow learners, share tips, and seek support.

We are here to support you every step of the way. If you have any questions or need assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to our support team at [{{.supportEmail}}].

Happy learning!

Best regards,

{{.app}} Team

resetPassword.body:

Best regards,
